author: Louis
title: Burblr - let's make books fun.
description: NFTs are confusing. There's a need for an intuitive Dapp that can bridge the gap between mass adoption, utility, and most importantly, fun.
solution: Team Burblr is connecting humans to Cardano by allowing them to collect and trade NFT audio/eBooks in a gamified way, with a credit card.
experience: 2 senior developers & 2 executive sales/marketing professionals with proven track records of success in startup & institutional capacities.
